snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday ordered the appointment of an independent monitor and a community advisory board to ensure that Sheriff Joe Arpaio complies with constitutional requirements.
abstract: Federal Judge Murray Snow orders the appointment of an independent monitor and a community advisory board to ensure that Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Ariz, complies with constitutional requirements after finding his office engages in racial profiling of Latinos.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday ordered the appointment of an independent monitor and a community advisory board to ensure that Sheriff Joe Arpaio complies with constitutional requirements.

headline.main: Arizona: Judge Orders Monitor to Oversee Maricopa County Sheriff
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Judge Orders Monitor To Oversee Maricopa County Sheriff
